text: Albula is one of the districts in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. It has an area of 723.13 km² and a population of 8,720 people (as of December 2004). Albula contains 4 Kreise (sub-districts) Alvaschein, Belfort, Bergün and Surses, which contains 23 municipalities: Alvaschein sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Alvaschein 149 4.06 Mon 88 8.51 Mutten 87 9.91 Stierva 144 10.54 Tiefencastel 254 14.85 Vaz/Obervaz 2,682 42.51 Belfort sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Alvaneu 443 35.68 Brienz/Brinzauls 117 13.38 Lantsch/Lenz 515 21.82 Schmitten 273 11.32 Surava 204 6.96 Bergün sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Bergün/Bravuogn 505 145.76 Filisur 475 44.58 Wiesen 327 29.49 Surses sub-district Municipality Population (31 Dec 2004) Area (km²) Bivio 230 76.70 Cunter 207 7.11 Marmorera 51 18.99 Mulegns 25 33.80 Riom-Parsonz 334 56.04 Salouf 206 31.41 Savognin 957 22.23 Sur 82 23.18 Tinizong-Rona 365 54.30 Category:Albula District
